pull_request.title: Disable tab key to avoid moving the window accidentally
pull_request.body: Not sure if this is universal but I have noticed that pressing tab would lock onto the element below the main canvas, this used to be fixable by running the auto adjust but that has been not working for a while, so a workaround would be disabling tab key in game to avoid getting stuck on losing the top 10% of the game screen. Usually it is not a big deal but it is large enough to blocker the top banner or airborne deployment.. (I remember I saw a similar issue/request a long time ago but can't find any somehow)

issue.title: Disable tab key to avoid moving the window accidentally
issue.body: Not sure if this is universal but I have noticed that pressing tab would lock onto the element below the main canvas, this used to be fixable by running the auto adjust but that has been not working for a while, so a workaround would be disabling tab key in game to avoid getting stuck on losing the top 10% of the game screen. Usually it is not a big deal but it is large enough to blocker the top banner or airborne deployment.. (I remember I saw a similar issue/request a long time ago but can't find any somehow)

comment.body: This implementation is not good enough since we have tab key for switching panel tabs. I'll take a look and find a fix for it

commits.message: Add option to display detailed information in overview

Merge pull request #2514 from liu-ziyang/Add-fleet-detail-option

Add option to display detailed information in overview

pull_request.title: Add option to display detailed information in overview
pull_request.body: This PR adds the configuration under appearance, and default to the current behavior. When disabled, the overview panel will display the same detailed information as the fleet panel, which include equipment information and fleet stats summary, etc. Agreed how it looks depends on the screen space, but hopefully leaving it as a configuration it's not too bad

comment.body: I think it's make more sense to name the option like 'Use detailed ship info section in main panel' and make the defaultValue to false

issue.body:
This PR adds the configuration under appearance, and default to the current behavior.

When disabled, the overview panel will display the same detailed information as the fleet panel, which include equipment information and fleet stats summary, etc.

comment.body: Could you provide screenshot for the change?

issue.title: Option to show detailed ship view instead of ship mini
issue.body:
**poi 版本 / poi version:**
10.9.2

**功能的详细描述 / Details on the feature:**
It would be great to have an option to allow showing detailed ship information (as in the fleet panel), instead of the ship mini panel which drops equipment info and some others. It is not a big deal to go back and forth, but the experience would be smooth if the fleet view is optionally integrated into the summary view

issue.title: Option to show detailed ship view instead of ship mini
issue.body:
**poi 版本 / poi version:**
10.9.2

**功能的详细描述 / Details on the feature:**
It would be great to have an option to allow showing detailed ship information (as in the fleet panel), instead of the ship mini panel which drops equipment info and some others. It is not a big deal to go back and forth, but the experience would be smooth if the fleet view is optionally integrated into the summary view

comment.body: I dont think it could be a release version feature because the ship panel is not designed for small space, but you can still pull the source code and change the mini ship panel to the normal one

issue.title: Use more screen areas by moving plugins into empty space
issue.body: **poi 版本 / poi version:** 10.9 **操作系统 / OS:** macOS but should be os independent **功能的详细描述 / Details on the feature:** Right now the game canvas is wrapped in a resizable canvas that wasted some screen space when played under most 16:9 monitors. It would be great if we can utilize the whole screen space if we can have additional layout that allows either plugins or the main panel to occupy this space, for example (The above layout is probably not very appealing , it probably makes more sense to put it on the bottom but I can't make it on the bottom at the moment) ------------------------------------------------------------ I am interested to contribute to this, but being very new with javascript/typescript/electron I didn't make much progress. In addition to my inexperience in the language I was also struggling to unwrap my head in the code around window handling since there is quite extensive code branching between window mode or not. (An alternative can be making the plugin panel also a window like the main game so we can move it around to under the game window, for example) If someone is interested to pair with me to get this to work that would be awesome

comment.body: It needs major changes to current layout, but a nice to have feature. will consider if there is a way to do it with less cost

release.name: poi v11.0.0-beta.1
release.body:
### Fixes

- Remove unused `Connect to npm server through proxy` option and fixed crash by enabling this option
release.short_description_html:
Fixes

  • Remove unused Connect to npm server through proxy option and fixed crash by enabling this option

commits.message: fix: remove use npm by proxy option

release.name: poi v11.0.0-beta.0
release.body:
## POI v11.0.0 changelog

### Features

- Brand new data fetcher which supports HTTPS protocol
- Add new Equipment icon
- Update game data to match latest game version, including AACI / OASW / Special Attack / Fighter Power Formula / Task type
- [Windows] Supports Windows 11 Arcylic style window (Experimental)

### Changes

- Update to Electron@27(Chromium@118)
